html:
2026-0131
2026-02-13DNDNational Defence ActRegulations Amending the Queen's Regulations and Orders for the Canadian ForcesRegulations Amending the Queen's Regulations and Orders for the Canadian Forces in order to (1) amend the language in Chapter 7 to reduce redundancies and simplify language to enable modernization of grievance processes; (2) align regulations with policy and procedure changes aimed at reducing delays in the overall grievances system; and (3) ensure that all grievances involving discrimination or incidents of a sexual nature receive an independent review by the Military Grievances External Review Committee.N/A
subject: Regulations Amending the Queen's Regulations and Orders for the Canadian Forces
precis: Regulations Amending the Queen's Regulations and Orders for the Canadian Forces in order to (1) amend the language in Chapter 7 to reduce redundancies and simplify language to enable modernization of grievance processes; (2) align regulations with policy and procedure changes aimed at reducing delays in the overall grievances system; and (3) ensure that all grievances involving discrimination or incidents of a sexual nature receive an independent review by the Military Grievances External Review Committee.
